atk-abh03a15:1_2: 5.408) satipaṭṭhānasaṁyutte vuttanayeneva yesaṁ kāyādayo satiyā ārammaṇadhamme gahetvā ‘‘sabbe dhammā satipaṭṭhānā’’ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a15:1_3: seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānaṁ. Andhakā nāma pubbaseliyā, aparaseliyā, rājagiriyā,
atk-abh03a15:1_5: Tesaṁ laddhivivecanatthaṁ pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a15:1_6: Tattha yasmā ‘‘patiṭṭhāti etesūti paṭṭhānā. Kā patiṭṭhāti? Sati.
atk-abh03a15:1_7: Satiyā paṭṭhānā satipaṭṭhānā’’ti iminā atthena satigocarāpi satipaṭṭhānā. ‘‘Patiṭṭhahantīti paṭṭhānā. Kā patiṭṭhahanti? Satiyo.
atk-abh03a15:1_8: Satiyova paṭṭhānā satipaṭṭhānā’’ti iminā atthena satiyova satipaṭṭhānā.
atk-abh03a15:1_10: Ye pana taṁ pariyāyaṁ pahāya ekanteneva ‘‘sabbe dhammā satipaṭṭhānā’’ti vadanti,
atk-abh03a15:1_13: Sabbe dhammā satīti anuyuttassa pana sabbesaṁ satisabhāvābhāvato paṭikkhepo tasseva.
atk-abh03a15:1_15: Ekāyanamaggo hi kilesānaṁ khayabhūtaṁ nibbānaṁ gacchatīti khayagāmī.
atk-abh03a15:1_18: Evametehi padehi ‘‘kiṁ te sabbe dhammā evarūpo te ekāyano maggo hotī’’ti pucchati.
